name: Class 12 Physics NCERT Solutions | Textbook | Note
description: This App Divided into Following Category is Mention Below.You will be easy to use.    Physics Book for class 12th Cbse/ Ncert student.    Physics Solution (All Chapters of solution describing question wise)   Physics Revision Notes   Physics Exemplar Problem    Physics Exemplar Solution    Physics Board Paper (Last 10 Year Previous Paper)   Physics Sample Paper   Chapters ::(All Chapters Are Mentioning Below which is included in this App).   Chapter 1: Electric Charges and Fields  Chapter 2: Electrostatic Potential and Capacitance  Chapter 3: Current Electricity  Chapter 4: Moving Charges and Magnetism  Chapter 5: Magnetism and Matter  Chapter 6: Electromagnetic Induction  Chapter 7: Alternating Current  Chapter 8: Electromagnetic Waves  Chapter 9: Ray Optics and Optical Instruments  Chapter 10: Wave Optics  Chapter 11: Dual Nature of Radiation and Matter  Chapter 12: Atoms  Chapter 13: Nuclei  Chapter 14: Semiconductor Electronics: Materials, Devises and Simple Circuits  Chapter 15: Communication System
